data: Emmerick | La Beale Ettarre | Guiron des Rocques
THE tale tells how Count Emmerick planned a notable marriage-feast for his sister La Beale Ettarre and Sir Guiron des Rocques.
The Cream of the Jest: A comedy of evasions
